mapper.sql: id, permission, description, pid, pids, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.permission, p.description, p.pid, p.pids, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM permission AS p JOIN role_permission AS rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN role AS r ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN user_role AS ur ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN user AS u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{principal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO permission (permission, description, pid, pids) VALUES (#{permission.permission}, #{permission.description}, #{permission.pid}, #{permission.pids})
